name: Breathless (itch) (DrCTos)
description:
John (Wuming) Dou is a Chinese international student studying electronic engineering at a US college. After a lab fallout, John starts experiencing depression, an unfamiliar emotion, and his world feels strange. Rushing back home in a panic and feeling exhausted, John lies down hoping to let the sleep wash over his feelings. He then falls into his inner world in search of a way back to his normal life.

Control:

W A S D: Move character

Mouse: Move camera

E: Interact with prompted objects

Flashing Key: Press the prompted key repeatedly

ESC: Pause menu

-/=: Skip scene prev/next

For full credit, please see the in-game credit screen.
